attributes.action: Reduce Number of Members of Parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To drastically reduce number of MPs,and remaining MPs must utilize technology/internet that is Forums and Their Own E-Petitions  to consult their constituents on a regular basis to ascertain their views before voting in the house, If MPs fail to take into account their constituents opinions, then they will be deselected by constituents.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
